name: collapsible
description: a module for collapsible animation of container

scripts.build-js: rm -rf ./dist/js; mkdir -p dist/js; browserify main.js > dist/js/main.js;
scripts.build-css: rm -rf ./dist/css; mkdir -p dist/css; node-sass --include-path src/scss src/scss/_collapsible.scss dist/css/main.css
scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist; npm run build-js; npm run build-css

author: Andy Coles
